parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.24

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Remote Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables unit's AV terminal(s) connecting to UAV.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[enableUAVConnectability]] [uav, checkAllItems]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> uav: [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> checkAllItems: [[Boolean]] - True for enabling of all terminals in unit's inventory, false for enabling of terminal assigned to proper slot only.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>unit [[enableUAVConnectability]] [uav, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[disableUAVConnectability]], [[isUAVConnectable]]
</value></part></template></root>
